questions.question: Considering the overall design, what is the primary style of this footwear, apparent from its shape and components?

What material is the heel constructed from, exhibiting a slight contrast in color against the shoe's upper?
Describe the visible shape of the toe, as seen from the frontal perspective, considering the curve and outline.

What component features prominently at the front of the shoe, adding a decorative element and slightly obscuring the vamp?
